mapper.sql: IMSI_AREA_ID, EFFC_TM, MSISDN_AREA_ID, LD_AREA_CD, IMSI_TYPE, EXPIRED_TM, ACCORDING_FILE_NM, LD_AREA_NM, reserved1, reserved2, reserved3
mapper.select: SELECT B.PROV_CD,A.MSISDN_AREA_ID FROM UPAY_CSYS_IMSI_LD_CD A,UPAY_CSYS_LD_AREA_CD_PROV_EXT B WHERE A.LD_AREA_CD = B.LD_AREA_CD and (getdate() >= convert(datetime, A.effc_tm) and getdate() <= convert(datetime, A.expired_tm)) and (getdate() >= convert(datetime, B.effc_tm) and getdate() <= convert(datetime, B.expired_tm))

SELECT distinct(B.PROV_CD) FROM UPAY_CSYS_IMSI_LD_CD A,UPAY_CSYS_LD_AREA_CD_PROV_EXT B WHERE A.LD_AREA_CD = B.LD_AREA_CD and MSISDN_AREA_ID = #{msisdnAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (getdate() >= convert(datetime, A.effc_tm) and getdate() <= convert(datetime, A.expired_tm)) and (getdate() >= convert(datetime, B.effc_tm) and getdate() <= convert(datetime, B.expired_tm))

SELECT B.PROV_CD FROM UPAY_CSYS_IMSI_LD_CD A,UPAY_CSYS_LD_AREA_CD_PROV_EXT B WHERE A.LD_AREA_CD = B.LD_AREA_CD and MSISDN_AREA_ID = #{msisdnAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (getdate() >= convert(datetime, A.effc_tm) and getdate() <= convert(datetime, A.expired_tm)) and (getdate() >= convert(datetime, B.effc_tm) and getdate() <= convert(datetime, B.expired_tm))
mapper.insert: insert into UPAY_CSYS_IMSI_LD_CD (IMSI_AREA_ID, EFFC_TM, MSISDN_AREA_ID, LD_AREA_CD, IMSI_TYPE, EXPIRED_TM, ACCORDING_FILE_NM, LD_AREA_NM, reserved1, reserved2, reserved3) values (#{imsiAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effcTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msisdnAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ldAreaCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imsiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiredTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accordingFileNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ldAreaNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update UPAY_CSYS_IMSI_LD_CD
MSISDN_AREA_ID = #{msisdnAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LD_AREA_CD = #{ldAreaCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMSI_TYPE = #{imsiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRED_TM = #{expiredTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCORDING_FILE_NM = #{accordingFileNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LD_AREA_NM = #{ldAreaNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserved1 = #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserved2 = #{reserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserved3 = #{reserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where IMSI_AREA_ID = #{imsiAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EFFC_TM = #{effcTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update UPAY_CSYS_IMSI_LD_CD set MSISDN_AREA_ID = #{msisdnAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LD_AREA_CD = #{ldAreaCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMSI_TYPE = #{imsiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRED_TM = #{expiredTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCORDING_FILE_NM = #{accordingFileNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LD_AREA_NM = #{ldAreaNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserved1 = #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserved2 = #{reserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserved3 = #{reserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where IMSI_AREA_ID = #{imsiAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EFFC_TM = #{effcTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from UPAY_CSYS_IMSI_LD_CD where getdate() >= convert(datetime, effc_tm) and getdate() <= convert(datetime, expired_tm)
